seo.title: Privacy Policy | Senova - Your Data Protected
seo.description: How Senova protects your personal and patient data. HIPAA compliant, CCPA ready, transparent data practices. Last updated November 2024.

hero.headline: Privacy Policy
hero.subheadline: Your privacy is fundamental to our mission. Learn how we protect and handle your data.

sections.title: Overview
sections.content: Senova ("we," "us," or "our") operates the Senova CRM platform and related services. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our platform, website, or services. We are committed to protecting your privacy and maintaining the security of your personal and patient information in compliance with HIPAA, CCPA, and other applicable regulations.

purposes.description: To provide, maintain, and improve our CRM platform and related services
To respond to inquiries, provide support, and send service-related notifications
To detect, prevent, and address technical issues and protect against fraud
To comply with legal obligations and enforce our terms of service
To understand usage patterns and improve our services (using aggregated data)

sections.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure

conditions.description: We share information when you explicitly authorize us to do so
With trusted third parties who assist in operating our platform (under strict confidentiality agreements)
When required by law, subpoena, or other legal process
In connection with mergers, acquisitions, or asset sales (with continued protection)
We may share aggregated, anonymized data that cannot identify individuals

never_share: We never sell your personal information
We never share patient data without explicit authorization
We never use patient data for advertising

sections.title: Data Security
measures: 256-bit encryption for data in transit and at rest
Regular security audits and penetration testing

sections.title: HIPAA Compliance
sections.content: For healthcare providers using our platform, we act as a Business Associate under HIPAA. We will enter into a Business Associate Agreement (BAA) with you and maintain appropriate safeguards for Protected Health Information (PHI). Our platform is designed to meet or exceed HIPAA's technical, physical, and administrative safeguards.

rights.description: Request access to your personal information we hold
Request corrections to inaccurate or incomplete information
Request deletion of your information (subject to legal requirements)
Receive your data in a structured, machine-readable format
Opt out of marketing communications at any time
Request restriction of processing in certain circumstances

sections.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
sections.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience, analyze usage, and support marketing efforts.

types.purpose: Required for platform functionality and security
Help us understand platform usage and improve services
Used to deliver relevant advertising (website only, not in platform)

sections.control: You can control cookies through your browser settings. Note that disabling cookies may affect platform functionality.

sections.title: California Privacy Rights (CCPA)
sections.content: California residents have additional rights under the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA):
rights: Right to know what personal information is collected, used, shared, or sold
Right to delete personal information (with exceptions)
Right to opt-out of the sale of personal information (we do not sell personal information)
Right to non-discrimination for exercising privacy rights

sections.title: Data Retention
sections.policy: We retain information for as long as necessary to provide our services and comply with legal obligations. Retention periods vary based on the type of information and purpose of collection. Patient data is retained according to HIPAA requirements and your retention settings.

sections.title: International Data Transfers
sections.content: Our services are provided from the United States. If you access our services from other countries, please be aware that your information may be transferred to, stored, and processed in the United States where our servers are located.

sections.title: Children's Privacy
sections.content: Our services are not intended for individuals under 18 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 18. If we learn we have collected information from a child under 18, we will delete that information promptly.

sections.title: Changes to This Policy
sections.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date. For significant changes, we will provide additional notice via email or through the platform.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us:
